name: Ninja Vanish
description:
Made in under 48hrs for #GGJ18 at the Philly Game Mechanics site at University of the Arts in Philadelphia.

Theme: Transmission

Art: Superpowers Ninja Adventure Asset Pack + Andrew Napierkowski

Music : Kyle Ashley

Code: Andrew Napierkowski

Controls (tested on PS4 controllers):

Square - Confirm / AfterImage

Cross -  Back / Slash

F11 - swap between fullscreen/windowed

If you would like to change the inputs per player, edit the input.json file and set the button1 (fade-advance) and button2 (slash) or key1/key2 in same context to match up with buttons listed here: 

https://github.com/MonoGame/MonoGame/blob/develop/MonoGame.Framework/Input/Butto...

or keys listed here:

https://github.com/MonoGame/MonoGame/blob/develop/MonoGame.Framework/Input/Keys....
